{"id":597066839,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1638670505,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"276 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/597066839/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"36.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int sz=1e4+2,mx=1e9;\n    vector<int>dp = vector<int>(sz,mx);\n    int numSquares(int n) {\n        if(n<=3)return dp[n]=n;\n        if(dp[n]!=mx)return dp[n];\n        for(int i=1;i*i<=n;i++)\n            dp[n]=min(dp[n],1+numSquares(n-i*i));\n        return dp[n];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares"}
